MS MCQs

    Plan a testing strategy for your Dynamics 365 solution

    »

    1. What are process steps involved in testing?

      Prepare, Test, Rework, Review

      Plan, Prepare, Execute, Report

      Plan, Execute, Rework, Report

      Prepare, Test, Execute, Review


    2. Which of the following is not a test type that may be covered during the Test Strategy Workshop?

      Unit Test

      Acceptance Tests

      Performance Tests

      Aptitude Test

      Go-Live Tests


    3. What is user acceptance testing used for when implementing a test strategy?

      User acceptance testing is critical to ensure go-live sign-off as well as acceptance of the new system post-go-live.

      To make sure users can log on to the new system.

      To have a signed contract that users will test the system.

      To test if the system will accept existing users into the new system.
